//will use isAuthenticated boolean in our state to determine which set of links to render (thus the need for map state to props)
import{connect}from"react-redux";import{logout}from"../../actions/session_actions";import Greeting from"./greeting";var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{currentUser:state.session.user,loggedIn:state.session.isAuthenticated};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,{logout:logout})(Greeting);
